sql.statement: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS pos_systeem

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pos_systeem ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, _mainid INTEGER DEFAULT 0, systeemkey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, systeemvalue VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT '', description VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT '', seqno INTEGER DEFAULT 0, inputtype INTEGER DEFAULT 0, recordtype INTEGER DEFAULT 0)
CREATE INDEX "pos_systeem_idx" ON "pos_systeem" ("systeemkey" ASC)
